mapper.select: select a.catenum catenum, catename, catesort, cateimg, mcatenum, mcatename, mcatesort from category a join mcategory b on a.catenum = b.catenum order by catesort, mcatesort

select ordernum, od.productnum productnum, productname, orderquantity, to_char(orderconfirm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') orderconfirm, orderprice from (select ordernum, productnum, orderquantity, orderconfirm, orderprice from orderdetail) od join product pd on od.productnum = pd.productnum where userid='ghdrlfehd'
and pd.productnum in
${item}
and orderconfirm between #{startCalendarDataValue} and #{endCalendarDataValue} order by orderconfirm asc
